medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain and low-grade fevers for 48 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior to admission after consuming ice cream, characterized by lower abdominal pain. The patient experienced night sweats at home but denies nausea or vomiting. Bowel movements are typically once a day of loose consistency, with the last bowel movement being 24 hours ago and nonbloody. The patient is passing gas.
medical_history.family_history: No first or second degree family history of gastrointestinal cancers or inflammatory bowel disease; great aunt with unspecified condition.
